targets.query: SELECT sum("forwarding_decision") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFOInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("deciding_destination") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFOInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("waiting_for_decision") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFOInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("waiting_for_token") / (sum("waiting_for_token")+sum("processing_token")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFOInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("processing_token") / (sum("waiting_for_token")+sum("processing_token")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFOInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("capacity_rate") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFApplicationInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND subelement=~/.*_${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("capacity_rate") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFApplicationInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND subelement=~/.*_${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY subelement, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("completion_time") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRCompleteInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND subelement=~/.*_${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("completion_time") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRCompleteInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND subelement=~/.*_${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("completion_time") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRCompleteInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND subelement=~/.*_${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY subelement, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("completion_time") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRCompleteInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND subelement=~/.*_${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("decisions_received")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFOInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("decisions_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFOInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("generated_trigger_records"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("received_trigger_decisions"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("generated_data_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${trb}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("generated_data_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("generated_trigger_records")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("generated_trigger_records")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application" fill(null)

SELECT sum("data_request_width") / sum("generated_data_requests") * 16 FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter AND "generated_data_requests" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("trigger_decision_width") / sum("received_trigger_decisions") * 16 FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter AND "received_trigger_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("data") FROM (SELECT (last("pending_fragments") +  last("fragments_in_the_book")) / last("pending_trigger_decisions") AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND "pending_trigger_decisions" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT sum("data_waiting_time") / sum("generated_trigger_records")  FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND application=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY application, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("writing_time_us") / sum("new_records_written") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DataWriterInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter AND "new_records_written" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

SELECT sum("writing_time_us") / sum("new_records_written") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DataWriterInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter AND "new_records_written" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("data") FROM (SELECT mean("pending_trigger_decisions") AS "data"  FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT sum("data") FROM (SELECT mean("pending_fragments") AS "data"  FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND  "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT sum("data") FROM (SELECT mean("fragments_in_the_book") AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "application"=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

panels.description: Data will not be visualised if no TRs are in making at the time of querying. This is likely to happen in a condition of low trigger rate. So, no worries if it happens.

targets.query: SELECT min("min_time_since_assignment") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFApplicationInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "subelement"=~/.+_${application}/ AND $timeFilter AND "outstanding_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_time_since_assignment") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFApplicationInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "subelement"=~/.+_${application}/  AND $timeFilter AND "outstanding_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("total_time_since_assignment")/sum("outstanding_decisions") FROM  "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFApplicationInfo"  WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "subelement"=~/.+_${application}/  AND $timeFilter AND "outstanding_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY "subelement", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("total_time_since_assignment")/sum("outstanding_decisions") FROM  "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DFApplicationInfo"  WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "subelement"=~/.+_${df_app}/  AND $timeFilter AND "outstanding_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Pending TD waiting time

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("loop_counter")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("sleep_counter")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRBInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
